commitMessage:
@@@Add Oracle Select Model Clause Definition (#11503)

* add oracle select model clause definition

* change modelClause rule

* add modelExpr.  introduce condition.  and remove previous simpleExpr rule

* comment out external source SQLs

* complete condition rule

* uncomment testcases and modify modelExpr to match with uncommented testcases

* define keyword A in Keyword.g4

* capitalize keywords in SQL statements which consist of character A

* remove commented code
